utilities.maths

Class Math

  • java.lang.Object
    • utilities.maths.Math

  • public class Math
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains various math helpers.
    Author:
    Mathieu Plourde - mat.plourde@gmail.com

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double getDotProduct(double ux, double uy, double vx, double vy)
      Returns the dot product of vectors u(x,y) and v(x,y).
      static double getEuclidianDistance(double x0, double y0, double x1, double y1)
      Returns the Euclidian distance between the 2 points (x0, y0) and (x1, y1).
      static double getEuclidianDistance(Point p0, Point p1)
      Returns the Euclidian distance between the 2 points p0 and p1.
      static ParametricLine getLine(double x0, double y0, double x1, double y1)
      Returns the Parametric line from point p(x0, y0) to p(x1, y1).
      static ParametricLine getLine(Point p0, Point p1)
      Returns the Parametric line from point p0 to p1.
